### Chart C

```{r}
Alle_koren_energy_plot <-
  Alle_koren %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = playlist, y = energy)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  xlab("Koren") +
  ylab("Energy") +
  geom_hline(yintercept=mean(top_100_over_alle_jaren$energy, na.rm = TRUE), linetype="dashed")

Alle_koren_energy_plot
```
